src:
Damkar Jakut: Gedung Hailai yang Terbakar Bekas Arena Boling
05 Nov 2019, 00:35 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Gedung kosong di Ancol, Jakarta Utara, yang terbakar milik Hailai. Gedung tersebut bekas bangunan arena boling.
"Gedung kosong Hailai yang sudah nggak kepakai, dulunya boling," kata Kasudin Gulkarmat Jakarta Utara Satriadi Gunawan, saat dikonfirmasi, Selasa (5/11/2019) dini hari.
Satriadi mengatakan kondisi api masih merah. Sejumlah petugas pemadam kebakaran masih berjibaku memadamkan api.
Dia menerangkan sejauh ini tidak ada kendala dari petugas pemadam kebakaran untuk memadamkan api. Sebanyak 16 unit mobil pemadam kebakaran sudah berada di lokasi.
"(Situasi) masih merah," jelasnya.
Sementara itu, petugas Sudin Damkar Jakut, Udin, menerangkan objek yang terbakar cukup luas. Jadi perlu penambahan unit mobil pemadam kebakaran hingga sumber air.
"Yang terbakar cukup luas, butuh dukungan air dan personel," tutur Udin dihubungi secara terpisah.

(idn/fai)
text:
North Jakarta Damkar: The Hailai Building Burned by the Exit Arena Bowling
05 Nov 2019, 00:35 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Empty building in Ancol, North Jakarta, which caught fire belonging to Hailai. The building is a former bowling alley building.
"Hailai's empty building that was not used, was bowling," said North Jakarta Kasudin Gulkarmat Satriadi Gunawan, when confirmed, Tuesday (11/5/2019) early morning.
Satriadi said the fire was still red. A number of firefighters are still struggling to extinguish the fire.
He explained that so far there were no obstacles from firefighters to extinguish the fire. A total of 16 units of fire trucks are already on location.
"(The situation) is still red," he explained.
Meanwhile, the North Jakarta Damkar Sub-dept. Officer, Udin, explained that the burned objects were quite extensive. So it is necessary to add fire truck units to water sources.
"The burnt area is quite extensive, it needs water and personnel support," Udin said when contacted separately.

(idn / fai)
